acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to manufacture POJOs which contain immutable collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToManufacturePojosWhichContainImmutableCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableDefaultFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[key should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
Then the List should have exactly U0cTSy1Hyo elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{yyjqqiqv6Q=933097427 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly XV1VnrLvDq=1948271356 elements
